prompt:

Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in full-stack development. Led teams of 5-10 developers, delivering projects 15% ahead of schedule. Improved system performance by 40% through optimization.

Looking for a seasoned architect to lead technical initiatives, design scalable solutions, and drive enterprise architecture transformation. Must have experience with cloud platforms, API design, and team leadership.
